Merge MET Nordic files (hourly)

Source: R/metnordic_merge_hourly.R
metnordic_merge_hourly.Rd

This function lets you combine the hourly files downloaded by download_metnordic() into single files. Note, these files are separate per variable!

Usage

metnordic_merge_hourly(
  folderpath,
  variable,
  outpath,
  n_cores = NULL,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  verify = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

folderpath

(String) folder where individual files are located

variable

(String) MET Nordic variable to combine

outpath

(String) folder where to write the file

n_cores

(Integer) Number of cores to use for parallel processing (Defaults to max - 2)

overwrite

(Boolean) overwrite existing file?

verify

(Boolean) an optional check to see if all files to be merged are incremental (Recommended!)

verbose

(Boolean) print status?

Value

path of written file

See also

metnordic_download() metnordic_extract()
